element.name: TColorPicker
element.short: Colors choice similar to Components inspector (Colors combo box plus colors dialog button)
element.descr:
Base colors, and their identifiers cannot be changed.
Selected text cannot be edited. To change the selected color, use the colors dialog or paste a color with the popup menu. An invalid color is ignored.
Selected colours not in base colours are added at the end of the list.
Like base combo box, component height is related to the items height.
The colors dialog is localized by the operating system.

element.name: TColorPicker.ItemHeight
element.short: The default height of an item in the drop-down for the control.
element.descr: Like base combo box, component height is related to the items height.

element.name: TColorPicker.ItemWidth
element.short: The minimum width of the items in the drop-down list.
element.descr: The minimum width of the items in the drop-down list.

element.name: TColorPicker.MnuCopyCaption
element.short: "Copy" menu item to copy the selected color to the clipboard

element.name: TColorPicker.MnuPasteCaption
element.short: "Paste" menu item to paste the selected color from the clipboard

element.name: TColorPicker.Color
element.descr: Thiw is not the component color, but the default color selected and returned by the component.
